net.gree.asdk.api
Class GreeUser

java.lang.Object
  net.gree.asdk.api.GreeUser

public class GreeUser
extends java.lang.Object

Implements GreeUser API, a la OpenSocial People API.

Author:
GREE, Inc.
See Also:
opensocial rfc section 7.1

Field Detail

USER_GRADE_LITE

public static final int USER_GRADE_LITE
A limited user has been registered with a username and password. Limited users have no API restrictions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

USER_GRADE_LIMITED

public static final int USER_GRADE_LIMITED
A limited user has been registered with a username and password. Limited users have no API restrictions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

USER_GRADE_STANDARD

public static final int USER_GRADE_STANDARD
A standard user has been registered with a username and password and has also been verified. Standard users have no API restrictions, thus, the Platform SDK makes no functional distinction between GreeUserGradeLimited and GreeUserGradeStandard.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getThumbnail

public Bitmap getThumbnail()
Get the thumbnail, synchronize call, return immediately.

Returns:
if the thumbnail is ready, return the bitmap,otherwise return null

loadThumbnail

public boolean loadThumbnail(IconDownloadListener listener)
Load the thumbnail, asynchronize call,none-blocking, the listener will be called back when the request is done pass in the IconDownloadListener to get the result of the request.

Parameters:
listener - to notify when the icon is loaded
Returns:
return false means the request could not fulfill(no listener,network error,permission error, etc).

public void isIgnoringUserWithId(java.lang.String pid,
                                 GreeUser.GreeIgnoredUserListener listener)

Returns:
the display name

getUserGrade

public int getUserGrade()
This user's grade. A user's grade determines what services he/she has access to. Certain API actions may trigger a prompt asking the user to upgrade.

Returns:
one of USER_GRADE_LITE, USER_GRADE_LIMITED, USER_GRADE_STANDARD

public java.lang.String getRegion()
User's country of registration. (i.e. US, JP, etc.)

Returns:
